text: @WhiteHouse Covid19 is in very warm Countries right now so why didn't the heat kill it?? Its because TRUMP is not listening to scientists as usual and spouts rubbish and lies as usual. TRUMP wont answer questions from reporters it's a joke these are damaging reports from TRUMP as usual
